Perseus was puzzled.  How could they have rendered her unconscious in
so fe=
w shots?  Could they have created a new type of weapon?  And how
had he not=
 noticed that Blacknightmare was unconscious on the ground???

"I must be g=
etting old..." he thought to himself.

Guardia spoke, "It doesn't matter if=
 she lies, or if she might betray
us.  You cannot know that she will do thi=
s, and if you simply kill
her, you will never understand what she is doing =
here." 

She then turned to Lord Perseus.

"Honestly, this is why the Predi=
cons are such a backwards group...
Guilty until proven innocent..."
